value.message: Error is logged without context information in catch block.
value.suggestion: Log error with message, stack trace, and relevant context (e.g., order id) for better debugging.

value.message: Error is logged without context information in catch block.
value.suggestion: Log error with message, stack trace, and relevant context (e.g., order id) for better debugging.

value.message: Order ID from useParams is sent directly to getOrderById and cancelOrder without verifying resource ownership. This may allow users to access or cancel orders they do not own (IDOR risk).
value.suggestion: Ensure backend APIs for getOrderById and cancelOrder verify that the order belongs to the authenticated user. Do not rely solely on the client-provided ID for authorization.
